verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: launched] [ARG1: an attack on the science behind many of the nation ’s clean air and clean water rules] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] , [ARGM-ADV: announcing plans to ban regulators from using studies that the country ’s most prominent research organizations say are crucial to effectively protecting the environment] .
